constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 所有单元立方体的编号必须是唯一的，且从1到n^3。
constraints.formal: ∀i, j (1 ≤ i, j ≤ n^3), i ≠ j → number(i) ≠ number(j)

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 单元立方体的编号必须按照某种顺序排列，使得相邻的编号在空间上也是相邻的。
constraints.formal: ∀i, j (1 ≤ i, j ≤ n^3), |number(i) - number(j)| = 1 → adjacent(i, j)
